io.scanbot.sdk.util.bitmap

Class ImageQualityOptimizer

  • io.scanbot.sdk.util.bitmap.ImageQualityOptimizer

  • public class ImageQualityOptimizer

    Optimizes image quality {@see #optimizeImage}

    • Method Detail

      • optimizeImage

        public android.graphics.Bitmap optimizeImage(android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap,
                                             float widthInches,
                                             float heightInches,
                                             long maxRequiredDpi)

        Scales image to desirable quality.

        Parameters:
        bitmap - you want to optimize
        widthInches - - suppositious physical width
        heightInches - - suppositious physical height
        maxRequiredDpi - - desirable quality
        Returns:
        org.jetbrains.dokka.NodeRenderContent@502ec55a: optimized (scaled down) Bitmap. If quality of source image will be less than maxRequiredDpi, then original Bitmap will be returned

      • optimizeImage

        public android.graphics.Bitmap optimizeImage(android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap,
                                             long requiredDpi)

        Scales image to desirable quality.

        Parameters:
        bitmap - you want to optimize
        requiredDpi - - desirable quality
        Returns:
        org.jetbrains.dokka.NodeRenderContent@4ca23834: optimized (scaled down) {@Bitmap}. If quality of source image will be less than requiredDpi, then original {@Bitmap} will be returned
